title: QFilms Presents: The Same Difference
desc: The Long Beach QFilm Festival presents director Nneka Onuorah's groundbreaking documentary THE SAME DIFFERENCE at the beautiful Art Theatre Long Beach. A film about lesbians who discriminate againist other lesbians, THE SAME DIFFERENCE explores the hypocrisy of gender role policing and performative expectations.? *****Q&A WITH DIRECTOR NNEKA ONUORAH IMMEDIATELY FOLLOWING SCREENING******* Tickets will also be available at the door based on availability.
